entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, Twillingate
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to freezing rain near noon then to periods of rain or freezing rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
